meanings.definition: The branch of dentistry concerned with the study and treatment of diseases of the periodontium.
meanings.sent1: Periodontology focuses on studying and treating issues with the periodontium.
meanings.sent2: My cousin is a specialist in periodontology, helping patients with gum diseases.
meanings.sent3: The quirky dentist joked that his favorite topic was periodontology because gums have stories to tell.
meanings.sent4: In the forest of dental health, periodontology is the guardian of the trees, protecting the periodontium.
meanings.sent5: The textbook on periodontology painted a vivid picture of the intricate world of gum diseases.

meanings.definition: The practice of preventing, diagnosing, and treating diseases of the gums and other structures surrounding the teeth.
meanings.sent1: Regular dental check-ups are crucial in periodontology to maintain healthy gums.
meanings.sent2: The clinic offers specialized services in periodontology for patients with gum issues.
meanings.sent3: During the dental conference, the speaker made periodontology sound like a thrilling adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a well-maintained garden, thanks to the care she received in periodontology.
meanings.sent5: The dentist's passion for periodontology shone through in every patient interaction.
